quote: _“As DFA’s subject matter expert for operational technology, Phil has shown dedication to bringing a modern approach to plant floor applications, which benefit the business. **He is what I consider to be a rare leader that understands business needs as well as technical needs**.”_
_“**Phil has a natural talent for creating a positive and collaborative learning environment**, encouraging others to explore innovative solutions and cultivate a strong problem-solving mindset.”_

_“**Phil is one of those leaders who is willing and able to understand issues from both a high level as well as down to technical minutiae.** Perhaps most importantly Phil displays adaptability and resilience in the face of changing environments; he has the capability to quickly assimilate new information and incorporate it into on-going plans and decisions with aplomb.”_
